meaningMnemonic:
When you <kanji>infer</kanji> and <kanji>measure</kanji>, it’ll lead to some sort of <vocabulary>conjecture</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>speculation</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>guess</vocabulary> about something.

推測 means guessing based on known facts or information, while using reasoning to fill in the gaps.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
